channel.title: [PI] Multy Log Help [PI]
channel.description:
hello how can i change that a guy cant log in with 2 accounts,
see its a Pk server and evry kill gets Pk points so ppl farm Pk points when there are no staff members online ;s
just that the server rejects somebody if the ip is already logged in or something plz help me :) i make a friend Rep++ then ;D

item.title: [PI] Multy Log Help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW
item.description:
@RiiPiiNFtW wrote:

In Config.java, look for IPS_ALLOWED or something like that.

Read full topic
